name: Into the Woods (Adriano Silva)
description:
Survive the night in this game inspired by works like the SCP Foundation and it's many creatures.

This was the result of less than 2 days of work, for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam! All the 2d assets were drawn and painted by me, the sounds are public domain I've found searching the Internet.
The theme of this year's jam was "Mixing Genres", therefore, my game contains aspects of horror games + shooters + tower defense.
Typos might also show up, since everything was made in less than 2 days.

Use WASD or directionals to move and left mouse button to shoot and any key to start the game.

Download is optional, since the game can be played in your browser.

If you enjoyed this entry and/or want to help me in my indie dev path, please check my other games and follow me on Twitter :')
